Uses of Class
org.streaminer.stream.classifier.bayes.NaiveBayes

  • Packages that use NaiveBayes 
    Package Description
    org.streaminer.stream.classifier.bayes  

    • Uses of NaiveBayes in org.streaminer.stream.classifier.bayes

      Subclasses of NaiveBayes in org.streaminer.stream.classifier.bayes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BoundedBayes
      This class implements a NaiveBayes learner for nominal values.
      class  LossyBayes
      This class extends the NaiveBayes implementation but overrides the methods which are responsible for creating the distribution estimators.
      class  StickySamplingBayes
      This class extends the NaiveBayes implementation but overrides the methods which are responsible for creating the distribution estimators.
      class  TopKBayes
